mapper.select: select x.EmpId,x.EmpNo,x.EmpName,isnull((x.BatTicketNum-y.Qty),x.BatTicketNum) as Standbyticket from ( select a.BatId as BatId, b.EmpId, b.EmpNo, b.EmpName, a.BatTicketNum from Tbb_Batch a, Tbb_Employee b ) x, ( select BatId, EmpId, isnull(sum(CollNum),0) as Qty from Tbb_Collar group by EmpId, BatId ) y where x.BatId *= y.BatId and x.EmpId *= y.EmpId and x.BatId = #{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and x.EmpId = #{1,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM Tbb_Employee where EmpName = #{EmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EmpPassword =#{EmpPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EmpStatus1 !=-1
SELECT a.*,b.DeptName FROM Tbb_Employee a LEFT JOIN Tbb_Dept b ON a.DeptId=b.DeptId WHERE a.EmpStatus1 != -1 ORDER BY a.EmpId

SELECT a.*,b.DeptName FROM Tbb_Employee a LEFT JOIN Tbb_Dept b ON a.DeptId=b.DeptId WHERE a.EmpStatus1 != -1 and a.EmpName like '%'+rtrim(ltrim(#{a.EmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))+'%' or rtrim(ltrim(#{a.EmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))='' ORDER BY a.EmpId
mapper.insert: begin declare @EmpId int select @EmpId = isnull(max(EmpId),0) from Tbb_Employee insert into Tbb_Employee select @EmpId+1,#{EmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{EmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EmpPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{DeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{EmpBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{EmpStatus1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{EmpStatus2,jdbcType=INTEGER},'增加人员', getdate(),null,0 end
mapper.update:
update Tbb_Employee
EmpNo = #{EmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EmpName = #{EmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EmpBirth = #{EmpBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EmpPassword = #{EmpPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeptId = #{DeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EmpStatus1 = #{EmpStatus1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EmpStatus2 = #{EmpStatus2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
,UpdateTime = getdate() where EmpId = #{EmpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
